Crypto Operations
=================

Here are some examples for what you can do with this submodule



.. automodule:: optigatrust.crypto
   :members: random

.. autoclass:: optigatrust.crypto.ECCKey
   :members: generate, ecdsa_sign

.. autoclass:: optigatrust.crypto.RSAKey
   :members: generate, pkcs1v15_sign

.. autoclass:: optigatrust.crypto.ECDSASignature
    :members:

.. autoclass:: optigatrust.crypto.PKCS1v15Signature
    :members:
